WorkItem.ClosedComment: Please stop posting duplicates. We don't need a fifth copy of this.
WorkItem.Description:
Shadow priest hit values are being miscalculated in relationship to the cap.
 
As an example from a fresh 80 toon with very little hit gear:
Hit from gear: 1.11% from 29 hit rating
Hit from talents/racial: 7%
Rawr analysis: 115.11% Shadow hit, 396 hit rating above cap
 
I've checked two different toons and both 2.3.22 as well as the 3 online beta with the same result.  Also, hit doesn't even show up on the Relative Stat Values page, which I suspect is related.

Comments.Message: Instead of getting mad at reposts why not tell the person how to find the post you are referring to so they know how to check if a problem has already been posted?
Also a work around would be very helpful.
